question: I am wondering if anyone else has had a problem with high blood pressure, fast heartbeat, excessive thirst and lack of energy.  I ended up in the hospital earlier this week, doc at hospital  thought it was my heart.  Stress test and test on heart were negative.  My liver enzymes were elevated, yet hospital said my doctor wasn't affiliated with theirs, so when I got out of hospital my doctor would have to order more tests.  I have diabetes, which I didn't have before.  I am feeling down, because everytime I turn around something else is going wrong with my health.  My family doc today said my diabetes wasn't causing the problems, that it might be my liver.  I reminded him that I have Hep C and my liver enzymes were elevated, that I was getting ready to have liver biopsy.  He tells me, "Well there you go, if you know your liver enzymes are elevated among other things, then that is probably the problem!"  I paid him to tell me what I already know.  He was called when I was in the hospital yet his staff never noted anything in my chart.  I almost feel like giving up, I am so down.
title: Excessive thrist, elevated liver enzymes
